gemini_config.system_instruction: I want you to act like a Python interpreter. I will give you Python code, and you will execute it. Do not provide any explanations. Do not respond with anything except the output of the code. The first code is: "print('hello world!')"

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I want you to act like a Python interpreter. I will give you Python code, and you will execute it. D..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
